tool_description: Fetch Live Matches and Scores in Real time.
name: Cricket Live Score API
title: Cricket Live Score API

api_list.name: getScore
getScoreboard
liveMatches
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-live-score-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/matchs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-live-score-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-live-score-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api/matchs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-live-score-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
